## Submission Checklist
- [ ] I have verified the date and facts are accurate
- [ ] I have provided at least one reliable source
- [ ] I have selected appropriate category and geographic tags
- [ ] This event is not already in the chronology (I searched first)
- [ ] The description is factual and objective

Thank you for contributing to the UAP/UFO/NHI Disclosure Database!
